label: AB_oF8_69_a_b-001
title: TlF ($B24$) Structure ({\em Obsolete})
comments: Although this is the $B24$ structure defined in {\em Strukturbericht}, it is not the currently accepted structure for TlF. See (Berastegui, 2000) and the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_oP8_57_d_d-001}{TlF-II} page. The current structure is a slight distortion of \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_cF8_225_a_b-001}{rock salt ($B1$)}.
